trends: There have been 20 other sightings in Saginaw
There were no other sightings in Saginaw on or around November 24th 2011
divs: Sighting DetailsDriving south on Interstate-75; two orange spheres flew above my vehicle at approximately 200-400 mph. Craft pulsated orange. The crafts flew above my vehicle in an outward V-shape. Felt exhilarated. Wanted to pull over but the roads were too busy.
